dict.string: Start/Stop Apache & MySQL & FTP of XAMPP in Alfred.
Start/Stop Apache & MySQL & FTP of XAMPP in Alfred.

# Note: You may need to input your ROOT password just once when using this extension. # To reset your ROOT password just run `xampp root`
# start Start XAMPP (Apache, MySQL and eventually others) # startapache Start only Apache # startmysql Start only MySQL # startftp Start only ProFTPD
# stop Stop XAMPP (Apache, MySQL and eventually others) # stopapache Stop only Apache # stopmysql Stop only MySQL # stopftp Stop only ProFTPD
# reload Reload XAMPP (Apache, MySQL and eventually others) # reloadapache Reload only Apache # reloadmysql Reload only MySQL # reloadftp Reload only ProFTPD
# restart Stop and start XAMPP # security Check XAMPP's security
# enablessl Enable SSL support for Apache # disablessl Disable SSL support for Apache
# backup Make backup file of your XAMPP config, log and data files
# fix_rights Resets file permissions. INPUT=`echo "{query}" | tr A-Z a-z`
PASS=$(Authenticate.app/Contents/MacOS/Authenticate -get password) if [ $PASS = '' ] || [ $INPUT = 'root' ] then Authenticate.app/Contents/MacOS/Authenticate echo "Loaded admin password!" else PASS=$(Authenticate.app/Contents/MacOS/Authenticate -get password) echo $PASS | sudo -S sh -c "/Applications/XAMPP/xamppfiles/xampp {query}" fi
